name: places/ChIJBwvPmpRZwokRMF_GN176Atk
formattedAddress: 347 Bleecker St, New York, NY 10014, USA
adrFormatAddress: 347 Bleecker St, New York, NY 10014, USA

editorialSummary.text: Chain of designer denim boutiques, stocking the brand's jeans along with other trendy casualwear.

originalText.text: I absolutely adore this store! The clothing is of exceptional quality, and I could shop there all day. It's my go-to store, and it never disappoints. The staff Jen, Steven, Nat  and Nadia are incredibly friendly and welcoming, making me want to return again and again. They're undoubtedly the friendliest staff in the village. They remember your name and your previous purchases, taking the time to assist you without making you feel rushed. It's their exceptional service and the fantastic clothing that keep me coming back!

originalText.text:
Great selection and my associate Nadia was extremely friendly and helpful- she knew exactly what questions to ask to get my style so I loved *and bought* everything she recommended.

Will come back when I need some new jeans for sure

text.text:
Great selection and my associate Nadia was extremely friendly and helpful- she knew exactly what questions to ask to get my style so I loved *and bought* everything she recommended.

Will come back when I need some new jeans for sure

originalText.text: So much fun!!!  This is one of her favorite shops in the Village.  They always have wonderful new items that are not mass produced.  A lot of them are one of a kind items so check back often.  Rachel and Alvaro helped us and they asked a lot about what style she liked, took our info and said they would follow up as new items arrived.  They have done that and we will be heading back there soon.  She got a couple of super soft dress jeans and are a really sexy soft leather jacket with fringe that she has gotten a lot of compliments on since she got it.  We love stores like this that do not pressure you and where the staff works to develop you as a long time customer by trying to understand your style and what you might like.  They staff are 5 star and so are the clothes.  Not too pricey either.  Very nice vibe and we will be going back there again for sure.  Saw a few famous folks come in as we left.  Cool.    Check out all of our reviews.  If we do not like it we do no review it so all of the ones you see are places that are fantastic.  Follow us if you like.  We had over 17 million views in 2021 and we thank you for that.  We don't get paid, we just love to eat.  Be sure to click on "RobH" at the top of this review to see all of them and to follow us if you like good food and FUN.

originalText.text:
Oh. My. Word. Natalia. True confessions, I'd already visited the other store, earlier in the day. I was looking to try on some different styles than I already had and assumed a larger store would have a larger selection. But, I got curious, so I popped into Bleecker. I swear on the graves of my beloved dogs that I will NEVER go to another 7 store, again. I mean, with the outstanding exception of Bleecker Street! Why? Natalia greeted me like I was already a friend--and within nanoseconds, we were--and treated me like a queen! She explained the differences in every pair of jeans I tried. Advised me, but also listened to my concerns, opinions and taste.Specifically, I love my split seam Kimmie jeans, but felt like a sausage in the regular straight-leg. Natalia explained the different in the fabrics, and how the stretchiness factor can affect the fit and feel. I wouldn't have realized that on my own.
I never felt for a moment that I was being hard-sold. In fact, I felt only that it was a journey between us and whether I bought or walked, Natalia would welcome me again. Turns out I DID buy...ironically a pair that the other store didn't have in my size.
As I continue my journey with 7 jeans, I will not only visit Natalia when I'm next in town, I will also call her and seek her guidance to order things through her, rather than trial and error from online shopping.
I'm naturally a rebel without a cause. Had Natalia not been so easily, effortlessly warm, welcoming and crazy-helpful, I would have walked. I'd already bought a pair, that day (possibly a duplicate of something I already have) and had no need to spend more money. But, I confess, I am also prone to rewarding honest generosity of spirit. As a result, I'm on the Natalia train, for good!

originalText.text: I highly recommend you visit this store. The jeans are excellent, decently priced for the high quality. What brings me back again and again (almost all my jeans are from this store) is the great customer service - everybody here is very nice and Jennifer is amazing. They really help you choose what works for you. Also, the place has a nice atmosphere, lots of light. I hate shopping for cloths but I come here with pleasure.
